name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Notion is a collaborative platform that allows teams to plan, write, and organize all in one place.
target_audience: Teams, individuals, students, and professionals looking for a centralized workspace

name: Asana
description: Work management platform designed to help teams organize, track, and manage their work. Asana helps teams coordinate and manage projects, tasks, and deadlines.
target_audience: Teams of all sizes needing to coordinate complex projects and workflows

name: Trello
description: Visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective on any project. Trello's boards, lists, and cards enable teams to organize and prioritize projects in a fun, flexible way.
target_audience: Teams looking for visual project management and task tracking

name: Evernote
description: Note-taking app that helps you capture and prioritize ideas, projects, and to-do lists, so nothing falls through the cracks.
target_audience: Individuals and small teams looking to organize notes and information

name: ClickUp
description: Productivity platform that brings work together in one place. ClickUp offers task management, docs, goals, and chat in one unified platform.
target_audience: Teams looking for a comprehensive productivity platform
